name: True Slope
description:
Make a cute snowboarding game. That was the theme I drew for this GamesPlusJam edition and boy did I love it!  It's a small miracle I was able to develop something in under 6 hours (5 hours and 37 minutes to be exact), but here we are ! 

In True Slope, you control your boarder solely with your mouse. Left click to jump, Right click to brake should you need to. The goal is simple, try to get as far as you can within one minute !

Enjoy your time as the fastest snowboarder this galaxy has ever seen !
